content.text: 0) Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "mushrooms"@9:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chicken"@23:30 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a slow cooker"@34:47 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add the celery, zucchini, carrots, onion, tomato juice, broth, garlic, paprika and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the celery"@7:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "zucchini"@19:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "carrots"@29:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "onion"@38:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "tomato juice"@45:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "broth"@59:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "garlic"@66:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "paprika"@74:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "pepper"@86:92 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "cook"@13:17 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "low"@21:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "5 hours"@29:36 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until meat juices run clear"@40:67 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm.
4) Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat.
5) Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-12 "the cornstarch"@11:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "water"@30:35 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until smooth"@36:48 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "add"@50:53 / AC
		:ppt ( "the juices"@57:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
7) Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( "chicken"@13:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( "vegetables"@25:35 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "serve"@37:42 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "rice"@48:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
